item.title: Getting Started with Hugo (Redux)
item.description: Building a Static Web Site Hugo provides a framework for building static web sites. The look of the websites is controlled by themes. Content is generated easily using markdown files. Files are saved and versioned through GitHub. The generated web sites are published using GitHub Pages. Installing Hugo Home page: https://gohugo.io GitHub: https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo A pre-built Windows binary for Hugo can be installed with Chocolatey. https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#chocolatey-windows choco install hugo -confirm Hugo is installed at:
